decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with aggressive creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester, Cauldron Familiar, and Mayhem Devil, while utilizing sacrifice synergies with cards like Witch's Oven and Deadly Dispute to control the board and generate value. Ygra, Eater of All acts as a powerful finisher, backed up by disruption tools like Fatal Push and Claim the Firstborn. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy, with a mix of dual lands and utility lands to ensure consistent casting of spells and abilities.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of creatures, removal, and disruption to quickly pressure the opponent and control the board. By utilizing efficient creatures like Graveyard Trespasser and Bloodtithe Harvester, along with powerful spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan. With a strong mana base and a variety of threats, the deck can adapt to different matchups and maintain pressure throughout the game.

This deck focuses on creating a powerful board presence through a combination of creature spells and support cards. By utilizing the companion Keruga, the Macrosage, the player aims to draw extra cards and maintain card advantage while overwhelming their opponent with large creatures like Greater Tanuki and Trumpeting Carnosaur. Support cards like Spark Double and Release to the Wind help protect and duplicate key creatures, while Bedeck / Bedazzle and Leyline Binding provide versatile removal options. With a diverse mana base including various lands with unique abilities, this deck aims to control the battlefield and outvalue the opponent.

The deck focuses on assembling the Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II combo to create a powerful win condition. By utilizing cards like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Raffine's Informant to help search for key pieces, the deck is able to quickly set up its game-winning combination. Additional cards like Esika's Chariot and Skysovereign, Consul Flagship provide support and removal options, while Thoughtseize and Duress help disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck aims to efficiently control the board and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful combo.

The deck focuses on using Lotus Field and various untap effects to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing the player to cast powerful spells like Emergent Ultimatum and Peer into the Abyss. The deck includes cards like Hidden Strings and Vizier of Tumbling Sands to untap Lotus Field multiple times in a turn, while also including toolbox cards like Bala Ged Recovery and Boseiju, Who Endures for added flexibility and resilience. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a game-winning play.
